item.title: UK Rejoins EU’s Erasmus Student Exchange Program That It Left After Brexit
item.description: The government said it would pay about $760 million to allow young Britons to take part in 2027.

item.title: Trump Revised Chevron’s Venezuela Deal. Maduro’s Oil Trader Profited.
item.description: A firm controlled by a businessman sanctioned by the U.S. Treasury for ties to President Nicolás Maduro of Venezuela has sold millions of barrels from...

item.title: First Funeral Held for Victim of Bondi Beach Shooting
item.description: People mourned the death of Rabbi Eli Schlanger during the first funeral for those killed in the Bondi Beach shooting. He was a key organizer of the J...

item.title: Free Nigerian Students Recount Mass Kidnapping
item.description: Survivors of the St. Mary’s Catholic School abduction in Nigeria recall their harrowing ordeal and release.

item.title: The Secret Trial of the General Who Refused to Attack Tiananmen Square
item.description: In 1989, Gen. Xu Qinxian defied orders to crush the pro-democracy protests in Beijing. Now, leaked video from his court-martial is on YouTube.
